text: The women's 3000 metres event at the 2002 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Kingston, Jamaica, at National Stadium on 16 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Meseret Defar ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Mariem Alaoui Selsouli ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Olesya Syreva ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 16 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
